description: '''Cloud rap''' (also known as '''trillwave''') is a [[Music subgenre|subgenre]] of [[Internet rap|hip-hop]] that emerged in the late 2000s to early 2010s, drawing influences from [[trap music|trap]], [[Ambient music|ambient]] and [[New-age music|new age music]] to create a hazy, dreamlike, atmospheric and relaxed production style through the extensive use of reverb and ethereal [[Chopped and screwed|chopped]] samples. Originally pioneered by artists and producers such as [[Lil B]], [[Clams Casino (musician)|Clams Casino]], [[Friendzone (duo)|Friendzone]], [[Main Attrakionz]], [[Viper (rapper)|Viper]], [[Metro Zu]], and [[SpaceGhostPurrp]].
